main event: A sighting of an unidentified object observed on 22 March 1953 at Crystal Lake, Ohio.
interesting points: The object was potentially aircraft lights seen from a distance,The observation lasted for about 3 minutes,The event was reported at 1:30 a.m. on 19 March 1953,Visibility was described as bright daylight,The object disappeared from view moving towards Dayton.
sighted object: unidentified object that could have been aircraft lights
witness description: The witness is a male who saw the object while outdoors and was fairly certain of their observations.
